Items.Name: Ambient 25 °C
Items.ContentLine: Testing performed at ambient 25 °C ± 5 °C.

Items.Name: Temperature Range Testing
Items.ContentLine: Testing performed across full specified temperature range (-40°C to +85°C).

Items.Name: Controlled Humidity
Items.ContentLine: Testing performed in controlled humidity environment (45-55% RH).

Items.Name: Tools Calibrated (12 mo)
Items.ContentLine: All test instruments calibrated within the last 12 months, traceable to NIST.

Items.Name: Power Regulated ±5%
Items.ContentLine: Power supply maintains voltage regulation within ±5% during test.

Items.Name: Nominal Load
Items.ContentLine: Device tested under nominal load conditions as specified in datasheet.

Items.Name: Min/Max Load
Items.Description: Testing at minimum and maximum loads
Items.ContentLine: Device tested at minimum and maximum load conditions.

Items.Name: All Operating Modes
Items.Description: Verify functionality in all operating modes
Items.ContentLine: Device functionality verified in all specified operating modes.

Items.Name: Sample Size: 3 Units
Items.ContentLine: Three sample units tested to verify consistency.

Items.Name: Visual Inspection
Items.ContentLine: Visual inspection performed for physical defects, proper assembly, and labeling.

Items.Name: Dimensional Check
Items.ContentLine: Dimensional inspection performed to verify compliance with drawings.

Items.Name: Material Verification
Items.ContentLine: Material verification performed against specifications and BOM.

Items.Name: Photographic Documentation
Items.ContentLine: Test setup and key results documented with photographs.

Items.Name: Detailed Test Log
Items.ContentLine: Detailed test log maintained with timestamps and observations.

Items.Name: ESD Precautions
Items.ContentLine: ESD precautions followed: grounded wrist strap, ESD mat, and humidity-controlled environment.

Items.Name: Mathematical Model
Items.ContentLine: Analysis based on validated mathematical model with documented assumptions.

Items.Name: CAD Tool Validated
Items.ContentLine: CAD and analysis tools validated for this application per company procedures.

Items.Name: Worst-Case Analysis
Items.ContentLine: Analysis includes worst-case scenarios for all critical parameters.

Items.Name: Validated Simulation Model
Items.Description: Simulation model validated against test data
Items.ContentLine: Simulation model validated against empirical test data.

Items.Name: Corner Case Simulation
Items.ContentLine: Simulation includes corner cases and extreme operating conditions.

Items.Name: User Scenarios
Items.ContentLine: Demonstration covers typical user scenarios and use cases.

Items.Name: Live Operation
Items.ContentLine: Demonstration performed under live operating conditions.

Items.Name: Field Data Available
Items.Description: Field service data available for review
Items.ContentLine: Field service history data available spanning multiple years of operation.

Items.Name: Similar Design History
Items.ContentLine: Service history available from similar designs with comparable operating conditions.
